name: twitter-showcase
description: Twitter Showcase App is built with React and Node. It utilizes Twitter's APIs to allow users to search recent tweets of their favorite users.

scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm install && npm i --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm test --prefix client
